name: Catbot (Bork Games)
description:
"Catbot has been seemingly abandoned by their creator 'old man'. Join Catbot on a quest to find their missing parts reunite with 'old man'."

Explore the old mans house!
Epic memory game!
Beware if dog!
Save the day!

Student game. Point and click, developed by Bork! at The Game Assembly.

Credits:

Artists 
Pontu Canbäk - Alina Gromova- Torbjörn Lindfors

Level Designers
Simon Carlsson - Oscar Maris

Programmers
Fredrik Bladh - Karl Brunzell - Emil Hylén -  Sedin Mesic
